name: Dodge the Creepers!!!
description:
Dodge the creepers ! This is a pleasant mini-game. All you should do is control the movement of the character and dodge  the creepers spawned  from the edge. This  is my first game. There are no bugs on Windows, but there is something wrong with the Android vision.  You can find it in the Github Link, and it may be updated. Have fun with this game!

As  you see, there're some Chinese characters in the game, don't worry, it won't make itself different and not pleasant! I placed these characters to make my game looks "Awesome"！Haha...

Of course, you can use [W][A][S][D] or touch the screen buttons to move the character!
